search_tips: Try different keywords or check spelling
search_for_media: Search for a movie or TV show...
settings_description: Manage your account settings and site preferences.
page_not_found_desc: Sorry, the page you are looking for seems to have vanished into thin air.
disclaimer: This project is a private instance and is not affiliated with Jellyfin or The Movie Database (TMDB).
no_logs_found_desc: There are no events to display at the moment. New actions will appear here.
no_uptime_history: No uptime history for this service.
confirm_action_on_selected: Do you want to apply this action to selected items?
confirm_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete the selected items? This action is irreversible.
confirm_bulk_action_description: Apply this action to all selected items? This operation may be irreversible.

homepage.hero_title: Your Entertainment Universe, At Your Fingertips.
homepage.hero_subtitle: Explore the latest trends, discover new movies and series, and dive into a world of infinite content.

features.title: Why choose Jelly?
features.subtitle: A modern and personalized streaming experience

infinite_catalog.title: Infinite catalog
infinite_catalog.description: Discover thousands of movies, TV shows and anime. New content is added every week so you'll never run out of new things to watch.

available_everywhere.title: Available everywhere
available_everywhere.description: Access your favorite content on all your devices: TV, computer, tablet or smartphone. Your entertainment follows you everywhere.

active_community.title: Active community
active_community.description: Join the community on Discord to discuss, make content requests and participate in the service's life. Your opinion matters!

community.title: Join the community
community.subtitle: Discuss, share your discoveries and participate in the service's life
